properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is a Redeemer,
Jesus, God's own Son,
precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
Holy One.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus my Redeemer,
name above all names,
precious Lamb of God, Messiah,
O for sinners slain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I stand in glory
I will see His face,
and there I'll serve my King forever
in that holy place.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Thank You, O my Father,
for giving us Your Son,
and leaving Your Spirit
till the work on earth is done.
